Sentencas: The rigid nature of sealing glass-ceramics restricts the thermal cycling stability of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs), which thus evokes an interest in designing a sealing glass without crystallization under the operational condition of SOFCs.
Titulo: Improving the sealing performance of glass-ceramics for SOFCs applications by a unique 'composite' approach: A study on Na2O-SiO2 glass-ceramic system

Sentencas: In this paper, we report that the sealing performance of 30Na(2)O-70SiO(2) (in mole%) glass-ceramic can be significantly improved by Fe2O3 dopant through a composite approach.
Titulo: Improving the sealing performance of glass-ceramics for SOFCs applications by a unique 'composite' approach: A study on Na2O-SiO2 glass-ceramic system

Sentencas: In particular, the crystallization in glass can be suppressed by appropriate Fe2O3 dopant amount (8 mol%), which results in the improved sealing property of glass.
Titulo: Improving the sealing performance of glass-ceramics for SOFCs applications by a unique 'composite' approach: A study on Na2O-SiO2 glass-ceramic system

Sentencas: In addition, the glass modified with Fe2O3 shows good chemical compatibility with 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia (8YSZ) electrolyte and metallic interconnect (430 stainless steel) in dual atmospheres.
Titulo: Improving the sealing performance of glass-ceramics for SOFCs applications by a unique 'composite' approach: A study on Na2O-SiO2 glass-ceramic system

Sentencas: The possible mechanism for the improved sealing performance of 30Na(2)O-70SiO(2) glass-ceramic by this unique composite approach is also discussed.
Titulo: Improving the sealing performance of glass-ceramics for SOFCs applications by a unique 'composite' approach: A study on Na2O-SiO2 glass-ceramic system
